creator: remilpm@gmail.com
text:
Please re-assign the ticket to hadoop map
Reducer. Sorry for assigning to wrong group.
I need 2 helps.

1) need a Java map reducer sample program where multiple parameters 
are passed from mapper to reducer.
2) need a Java map reducer program where there is a write to a file inside 
hdfs filesystem as well as a read from a file inside hdfs other than 
the normal input file and output file mentioned in the mapper and reducer.

Have a nice day

Thanks
Remil
Hadoop issues aren't kept in bugzilla. You'll have to go create a new issue yourself. See https://hadoop.apache.org/issue_tracking.html
creator: csutherl@apache.org
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Your question is not a bug. It should not be asked in Bugzilla. It should not be asked in Hadoop's JIRA database either.

Subscribe to Hadoop's User mailing list and ask there.
https://hadoop.apache.org/mailing_lists.html#Users

See also "How To Ask Questions The Smart Way" document
http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html
